channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Mattress flytipped on Main road, 21st November
item.description:
Large burnt mattress flytipped on Main road

item.title: Strong smell of urine in the Christmas market huts opposite macdonald, 21st November
item.description:
We run the Christmas market in Leicester Square and I look after the traders. The traders reported strong smells of urine in their hut opposite macdonald at 3.44pm today.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 48, Leicester Square, Mayfair, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bury Street Edmonton N9 - Street cleaning, 21st November
item.description:
Bury street Edmonton has wet leaves and litter across pavement on both sides of the road. Please can we we get street cleaning team out to sweep up.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 70, Bury Street, Edmonton, Greater London

item.title: Major spill of food waste on pavement, 21st November
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Honor Oak Road, Forest Hill, Greater London

item.title: Dumped trolleys, 21st November
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): The Vista, Eltham

item.title: Two lamp posts in Chiltern Gardens are not working, 21st November
item.description:
Two lamp posts in Chiltern Gardens aren’t working properly. They don’t turn on at the same time as the other lamp on the road and surrounding area.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Chiltern Gardens, Shortlands, Greater London

item.title: Fly tipping, 21st November
item.description:
Could you please help us clean up the 2 giant black bags full of rubbish and the mattress. Someone left it over a week ago. Thank you

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Nightingale Vale, Woolwich

item.title: Rubbish left Outside, 21st November
item.description:
There is a mix of rubbish and construction material that has been left on this roof for several months. Persistent bad smell and, an increase in rats As this roof is very close to residential properties, it is an unhealthy and dangerous environment

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kingsland Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pedestrian crossing near 63 Haverstock Hill, 21st November
item.description:
Hi, the zebra crossing has a newly resurfaced speed bump. When heavy vehicles go over it at speed, there is a vibration that can be felt in nearby buildings. Can you please: 1. Add a large visible sign warning drivers that there is a speed bump? 2. Add a large visible sign to remind drivers of the speed limit? 3. Add a speed camera so that drivers are actually incentivized to slow down?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Haverstock Hill, Chalk Farm, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter Bin Overflowing - Torn refuse bags, 21st November
item.description:
On Timber Pond Road, SE16 6AG, opposite the junction with Dock Hill Avenue, the litter bin is overflowing and needs emptying. Blue council refuse bags next to bin need collecting. Some blue refuse bins have been torn open by foxes and litter is strewn across the pavement. Litter needs clearing. This is a new recurring problem due to sudden absence of street cleaners and litter bin not being emptied on a frequent basis.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 26, Dock Hill Avenue, Rotherhithe, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Curb stone sticking out into road near pavement by tree, 21st November
item.description:
In between number 59 & 61 Clive Road EN1 the tree in the pavement has pushed the curb stone out a significant amount & has caused damage to my car wheel whilst parking. This should really be fixed as its liable to cause damage to other people's cars too & will only get worse.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Clive Road, Southbury, Greater London
